title: Dev Portfolio
text: My personal website portfolio. Emphasis was put on a minimalistic design and layout for easier navigation. Built with React.js + Typescript + Bootstrap

title: Listvenitsa Guest Houses
text: A WordPress website for a client's guest houses. The site provides visitors with essential information about the accommodations, including details on amenities, houses and nearby landmarks. Emphasizing user experience, the website features a clean layout and intuitive navigation
